name: Ethical Zoo
description:
A small zoo tycoon/horror game with a Deck Builder

Made for the Genre Mash Jam

The main two genres I wanted to put together were a zoo simulator with a horror theme, but also I also ended up throwing a deck builder and rogue like mechanics in there because I'm addicted to them.

The theme was Reusable, and I thought of cheapskate's trying to reuse everything they probably shouldn't, so I made the player indebt so they have to be stingy and reuse everything they can.

Tips for playing:

You won't be fined at night

Feeding animals sick, dead, or unhealthy animals will make them sick

You can only butcher 1 animal a day, and animals breed, so be cautious of how many animals you get

Thanks for playing!
